hero.title: Next generation digital banking
hero.text: Take your financial life online. Your Easybank account will be a one-stop-shop for spending, saving, budgeting, investing, and much more.

profits.title: Why choose Easybank?
profits.text: We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your financial hub. Control your finances like never before.

cards.title: Online Banking
cards.text: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

cards.title: Simple Budgetin
cards.text: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

cards.title: Fast Onboarding
cards.text: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

cards.title: Open API
cards.text: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.
